resources.string: I enjoy drawing. I\'ve been working hard to get better.
I love to read. My favorite genres are action, adventure, fantasy, and mystery. My favorite book is The Way of Kings.
I can solve a 3x3 Rubik\'s Cube in 40 seconds. I can also solve a 4x4, 5x5, and a pentagonal dodecahedron.
I like animation. I hope to someday be able to animate myself, but in the meantime I enjoy watching it. Some of my favorite shows are Gravity Falls, Adventure Time, and Over the Garden Wall.
I love and play all video games. Some of my current favorite games are Professor Layton, Arkham Knight, Transisitor, Shadow of the Colossus, and A Link Between Worlds.
